briefTitle: Clinical Study of the Immunogenicity of GSK Biologicals' Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A in People Aged 65 Years or Older
officialTitle: Observer-blind Immunogenicity Study of GSK Biologicals' Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A in Elderly Subjects

arms.label: New generation influenza vaccine GSK2186877A Group

summary: This clinical trial aims to study the immunogenicity of GSK Biologicals' influenza vaccine GSK2186877A in people aged 65 years or older.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Geometric Mean (GM) Number of Influenza-specific CD4 T-cells Per Million CD4+ T-cells Identified After in Vitro Stimulation With Pooled Vaccine Strains Which Are Producing at Least Two Different Markers

effectByArm.arm: New Generation Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A Group
